title: Fantom validator entry threshold drops to 50k FTM after governance vote
description: Fantom's governance vote lowers validator self-stake from 500k to 50k FTM, aiming to boost security and accessibility without compromising speed.

title: XRP Beats BNB, Solana, and Cardano in the Liquidity Ranking
description:
Kaiko, an institutional-grade analytic platform, recently released a research report that positioned XRP ahead of competitors such as Binance (BNB), Solana (SOL), and Cardano (ADA) in terms of liquidity. The report weighed in on the liquidity metric of 50 top-ranking tokens, with the fourth quarter of 2023 being the observation period. Kaiko questioned the conventional […]

The post XRP Beats BNB, Solana, and Cardano in the Liquidity Ranking appeared first on Coin Edition.
